3.title: Welcome to “Mastering UI/UX Design”
3.content: We are excited to welcome you to the UI/UX Design course! This course will guide you through the essentials of creating user-friendly, visually appealing, and impactful digital experiences. In the first week, we will explore the foundations of user-centered design, learn the key differences between UI and UX, and practice evaluating existing interfaces. Throughout the course, you’ll also gain hands-on experience with wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing. Please take a moment to review the course syllabus available in the overview section and introduce yourself in the community space. We look forward to working together to design engaging and meaningful user experiences!
